name: Zucchini Noodle Shrimp Scampi
author: MCabrera75
summary: We love shrimp scampi, but have decided to cut back where we can on heavy carbs. This is the perfect solution! I will be swapping out pasta for veggie noodles quite frequently now!
ingredients: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, or to taste
2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Make zucchini noodles using a spiralizer or julienne peeler
Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Add shallot; cook and stir until tender, 4 to 5 minutes
Add minced garlic; cook until golden, about 2 minutes
Stir in wine and lemon juice; cook until sauce is reduced by almost half, about 3 minutes
Add shrimp, salt, and black pepper
Cook until shrimp turn pink, 2 to 3 minutes
Season with salt and black pepper
Cook until noodles are tender, 4 to 6 minutes
Stir in parsley and Parmesan cheese before serving
